description: Detecting Emotet DLL loading by looking for rundll32.exe processes with command lines ending in ,RunDLL or ,Control_RunDLL Author: FPT.EagleEye. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Emotet RunDLL32 Process Creation
query: (((process.executable:*\\rundll32.exe AND process.command_line:(*,RunDLL OR *,Control_RunDLL)) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable:*\\tracker.exe))) AND (NOT (process.command_line:(*.dll,Control_RunDLL OR *.dll\",Control_RunDLL OR *.dll',Control_RunDLL))))
